title: My Comp Freezes at near the beginning of each game and I have to restart computer..
body:
So I recently just downloaded the latest big update for windows 10. Ever since, every time I connect into a game about a minute of game time goes by and my game freezes and I have to take 5-15min to restart my computer and reconnect. I honestly cannot play league anymore and that is very frustrating. 

Can anyone help me?

replies.body:
This is very likely to be the result of the Game DVR feature that was enabled in the Xbox game bar. I strongly suggest [disabling the game bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.
I have  the same issue, I can tell you that i've reset my windows installation and still encounter the  same problem. No idea how to fix it yet :(
